experience: You and Nicole both know Erika Flora PMP, PgMP, ITIL Expert,PRINCE2,CSP, Geoffrey Viado, and 47 others

It was great being at ICSC in Orlando last week! We enjoyed meeting everyone last week and are looking forward to staying in touch with you all! Great job to everyone competing and we loved being able to talk about opportunities that Signature Consultants has for you!

What a week! I want to thank everyone at Florida State for putting together another great International Collegiate Sales Competition. Huge thanks to all of the amazing corportate sponsors who make this happen as well. Also wanted to thank my Cincinnati teammates Lauren Vanatsky and Vincent Pfirrman along with our great coach John Cox! Could not have gotten here without all of you!

Signature Consultants is an industry leading provider of IT staff augmentation solutions. Each of our offices specializes in the recruitment of IT staffing professionals with critical, in-demand information technology skills. As an Account Manager, it is my responsibility to meet with clients to establish a professional relationship and determine how we can best support their needs. With clients ranging in size from small businesses to Fortune 500 companies, we understand the ever increasing need for skilled IT professionals in the development and maintenance of new technologies. Our consultants are as strong in diversity as they are in numbers. The Signature team is not only comprised of the best IT professionals available, but we have also built relationships with consultants representing the widest possible range of skill sets, including:•	Application Development •	Analysis and Design •	Project Management •	Architecture •	Quality Assurance •	Training Database Development and Administration •	System/Software – Implementations and Support •	Network Security •	IT Talent Acquisition In short, there is virtually no IT need that Signature cannot fill with an experienced consultant quickly and within budget. We know that our name is on the line with every project, and our team strives to meet our own high expectations at every turn.“We’ve been Getting IT Right for 20+ years. Voted one of the "Best Staffing Firms to Work For” seven years in a row by Staffing Industry Analysts.

Recruit for local consultants in the IT industry ranging from Help Desk, Analysts, Developers, Project Managers, and anything in between. Lead the daily "stand up" meeting and participate in weekly Branch Operations meetings. Attend client visits to learn about the client's needs and the company environment. Call potential candidates from company database, job boards (Monster, Career Builder, Dice), and through referrals. Screen for a potential match with roles in hand, and proactively look for opportunities for a candidate. Conduct in-depth, in person interviews to best present them to hiring managers. Strive to build a positive relationship by following up with daily, weekly and monthly calls. Serve as Subject Matter Expert on Job Postings and our Applicant Tracking System for the Scottsdale office, and provide guidance to others on using the tools. Train new employees through an intensive 13 week program and serve as a mentor working one on one to build their skills and hone in on their development. Responsible for the hiring and firing decisions for all new internal employees. Grew an office of four Recruiters to fifteen within a year with improved turnover percentage.

In charge of hiring RNs/LPNs in Maricopa County. Play a key part in the interviewing, orientations, and on-boarding process for new hires. Schedule nurses in 60+ patients homes for long-term, hourly, private-duty homecare. Respond to client and nurse complaints in a professional manner. Verify insurance benefits for clients and obtain denials. Input client and nurses hours into infoMax for appropriate billing and payroll. Adjust payroll for the week and send report to corporate to ensure nurses will be paid on time. Coordinate with corporate payroll specialist about any errors or questions regarding payroll.  Assist with our ongoing flu & wellness program. Schedule nurses for hundreds clinics statewide. Pack supplies for expected attendance at clinics. Attend flu and wellness clinics to make sure the process is running efficiently and help with filling out paperwork for clients.

Daily duties involved renting cars to people, cleaning/detailing rental cars, and handling insurance claims through third parties. Always up-sold insurance packages, larger or luxury vehicles, and additional features to the client to add more daily revenue. Conducted marketing visits to local vendors and potential clients to make sure business was at its best or what we could do to gain more business. Handled customer complaints and made sure everything was to their satisfaction. Attended seminars at our local headquarters to improve my selling abillities.
Kappa Alpha Theta, Flag Football Intramurals, Volleyball Intramurals, Young Life

Assisted with refereeing events such as track and field, basketball, volleyball and soccer. Provided encouragement to team members and made sure they were enjoying themselves. Interacted with parents of participants. Set up for sporting events and broke down everything at the end of the day.

Sorted medical supplies that had been donated from facilities throughout Arizona. Packed boxes full of medical supplies to be shipped to countries in need around the world.

Volunteer coach at YMCA for volleyball for 8-9 year olds. Held weekly practices and went over basic volleyball skills and rules of the game. Went to weekly games and supported the team, making sure their primary focus was fun, not winning.

recommendations: Briana VanBibber
Sales Development Representative at Houzz
August 17, 2017, Nicole was senior to Briana but didn’t manage directly

Nicole is a great example of an employee with an amazing work ethic. She never turned down a challenge and was constantly willing to learn any new skill that came her way when we worked together at Signature Consultants. She was not only very interpersonal in a work setting, but had a personable and radiant personality outside the office as well. She always supported and encouraged every colleague in the office and had impeccable leadership skills, which is why I would consider Nicole to be one of my major role models. Not just within a company setting, but also a represented a great example when concentrating on what is important to reach her own goals. She got things done ethically, on time, and had flawless communication skills, whether she was speaking with a client, consultant, or a co-worker. It was truly an honor to have learned from her and it was refreshing seeing a very positive management employee. I hope to one day work with Nicole again! I was blessed to have her be a part of my first professional work experience.

Strong sales professional with a Bachelor of Science (BS) focused in Business Administration and Management from Arizona State University.
